TopicTitle: Reaction control wheel roll is inverted

Articles.Content:
Seems to be the case with SRW-125 and the MK1 Peragrine. This causes the reaction wheels to fight the RCS and cause persistent wobble bleeding monoprop the whole time to fight it if SAS is enabled. Yaw and Pitch is correct. Enabling SAS without RCS will cause the craft to roll to one side and accelerate. You cannot use reaction wheels alone to point the craft at anything with SAS because of this, the craft just rolls and pitches/yaws aimlessly.

 

Edit: Quiting and restarting fixed the problem. So, at some point it became inverted for some reason.
